item.title: 1. Two Sum
item.description: https://leetcode.com/problems/two-sum/ Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target. You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution, and you may not use the same element twice. You can return the answer in any order. Idea: Here we construct a lookup map where the key is the number and the value is the index.
